snippet.title: Great Houses of Calderia - 1.0 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Great Houses of Calderia on Steam in 1.0: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia/?utm_source=releasetrailer
Great Houses of Calderia is available NOW in 1.0, save 40% off on Steam!

Become the most powerful House in this Feudal Grand Strategy by mastering diplomacy, intrigue, war, and economy. Manage your fiefdom and assign tasks to your characters. Make allies, enemies, trade, arrange marriages, and appeal for the most useful rank to achieve objectives.

Build your legacy of power and rise in the ranks of Calderia by any means necessary. Explore the intricacies of the politics of this Mediterranean Renaissance-inspired world.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

Great Houses of Calderia:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CalderiaGame
Steam page -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia
Official website - https://calderiagames.com
Newsletter - https://bit.ly/NL_Great_Houses_of_Calderia

Firesquid:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FiresquidGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr
Newsletter - https://bit.ly/FiresquidNewsletter

Resistance Games:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/resistancegames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesResistance
Official website - https://resistancegames.com

--------------------------------------------

Music:
Medieval Cinematic Epic (Sound Gallery by Dmitry Taras)

Trailer:
Suzanne Wallace (Indie Bard)
https://www.indiebard.co

Voice over:
Louise Saint-Clair

--------------------------------------------

Developed by Resistance Games and published by Firesquid
